SHOPCHEN
Combining element of paper craft, creativity,
feelings, environmental protection and
nature, we come up with novel ideas and keep
moving forward to create innovative products.

MORE
VALUE
warm x crazy creation

DESIGN

MATERIAL

PRODUCTION

MARKETING

We keep generating creativities and aim to provide customers with products with warm feelings, innovative design and natural materials.

Jean Topia, which stores more than 30,000 kinds of materials, helps us manage the materials in a systematical way. It is also a place for designer to find inspiration and check the cost.

Following intelligence trend, we develop advanced manufacturing processes and control our product quality strictly. We successfully create the delicacy of traditional craft and pay much attention to environmental sustainability issue.

The charming and customer-friendly display helps us boost sales performance effectively.
